segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading down, pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it; she could slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so absorbed in the plate, unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy on the stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks ready to collapse backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could be really bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below, so close, might get knocked over too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wet floor plus falling kid spells trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies are tempting them into this risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is serene, but here it's tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing happens before she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR
